name: Chicken Boom 2
description:
Chickens are booming again as you take on a hail of poultry, using your smarts and shooting skills to hold off the chickens falling to Earth.

Chicken Boom 2 features all-new hi-resolution graphics, swap-able weapons each with their pros and cons, a charming and catchy soundtrack from the original composer, the return of the ever- popular Chicken Storm, and Google Play services-powered leader boards to compete with other players around the world.

From rifles to laser blasters to timed boom-booms, defeat the never-ending horde and become the hero your farm needs and nightmare of hens everywhere.
